entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 01:36 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
